name: World Pay Coin
description: The WPC service uploads transaction information from all payments, rewards, and fund flows to the blockchain. Service participation date and time, payment user information, payment balance, fee information, etc. are recorded in the transaction, and this information is recorded in nodes that anyone can check. This provides a payment structure that allows connection to any services that require integrated payment methods such as O2O services, games, shopping, culture, artworks, construction and real estate provided by WPC beyond the centralized service operation method.
